articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD
articles.title: Pope says sex abuse is ‘demonic’ as he weighs in on new scandal in French church - The Associated Press
articles.description: Pope Francis has weighed in on the latest sex assault revelations that have further discredited a legendary French priest, Abbe Pierre. Francis told journalists returning from Asia that abuse was “demonic” and that Abbe Pierre was a sinner. Pierre’s Emmaus In…
articles.content: ABOARD THE PAPAL PLANE (AP) Pope Francis called sexual abuse demonic on Friday as he weighed in on the latest sex assault revelations against a legendary French priest, Abbe Pierre, who devoted his l… [+3181 chars]
